text: Hi! This chat app is developed by 'Razul'
ALTER TABLE `lms_dmdexam` ADD `exam_noofquestionseachmod` INT(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'No of question from each module for final DMA exam' AFTER `exam_noofquestions`;
ALTER TABLE `lms_exam_results` ADD `final_dma_exam` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0=other exam, 1=final dma exam' AFTER `sponsored_once`;

INSERT INTO `karmickd_swooji`.`lms_email_template` (`email_template_id`, `headline`, `description`, `add_dt`, `edit_dt`) VALUES (NULL, 'Passed in Final Dma Exam!', '

Hi [STUDENT_NAME],

Congratulation!

You have passed Final DMA Examination.

Thanks

', '2016-01-21 00:00:00', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), (NULL, 'Failed in Final Dma Exam !', '

Hi [STUDENT_NAME],

Sorry!

You have failed in Final DMA Examination.

Thanks

', '2016-01-21 00:00:00', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
ALTER TABLE `lms_user_admin_message` ADD `read_status` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0=unread,1=read' AFTER `sent_from`;
